text: No later than October 1, 2007, the Office of Unified Communications shall establish a schedule for the replacement of equipment for the 911 system. The schedule shall be updated on February 1 of each subsequent year.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3022(c) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-20, see notes following § 34-1514.

DC CODE § 34-1806

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Emergency and Non-Emergency Number Telephone System Assessments Fund.
